sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"使惊愕，使惊讶，使惊奇"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: surprise, amaze, astonish, astound, startle, stun
means: surprise ： 普通用词，多指因未预料或意外的事而引起的惊奇之感。
amaze ： 语气较强，指因认为不可能或极少可能发生情况的出现而感到惊讶或迷惑不解。
astonish ： 语气较强，指出乎预料，意外发生，但又无法解释而感到惊奇。
astound ： 语气强，指由于事情令人难以置信或实在罕见而使人感到震惊。
startle ： 指因突然的惊吓或意料不到的刺激等而使人惊跳或震惊。
stun ： 语气最强，指极度惊讶而目瞪口呆，不知所措。

sentence.Network_en: If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果把我们能做到的都做了，最终连我们自己都会被吓到。

sentence.Network_en: Their dark humor never failed to astound him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的黑色幽默总能让他咋舌。

sentence.Network_en: He used to astound his friends with feats of physical endurance.
sentence.Network_cn: 过去，他表现出来的惊人耐力常让朋友们大吃一惊。

list.abs: with his-flying antics , court presence , astounding talent and off-court branding , Jordan was an influential force behind the NBA's growth in popularity .随着他的高超球技，球场风采，惊人的天赋和场下的品牌效应，乔丹成为了NBA在时下蓬勃发展背后具有影响力的人物。
新概念英语单词Ⅲ Lesson 19-英语听力... ... 16.ransom 赎金 18.be astounded 感到吃惊 19.withdraw (从银行)提取.
yet Markus Willeke has found a way of watercolour painting with a new task , up-to-date relevance and astounding power .然而马克斯·威勒克已经找到致力于水彩画的方式，那就是新任务、不断更新的相关性和惊人的力量。
Perhaps the facts most astounding and most real are never communicated to man ., 也许那些最惊人 , 最真实的事实从没有在人与人之间交流.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (as an adjective in the sense 'stunned'): from astoned, past participle of obsolete astone (see astonish)

entry.tran: 使大吃一惊;使惊骇;使震惊
entry.def: If something astounds you, you are very surprised by it.

example.ex: He used to astound his friends with feats of physical endurance.
example.tran: 过去，他表现出来的惊人耐力常让朋友们大吃一惊。

sentences.sentence: "Your ability to speak six languages amazes me!"

auth_sentence.content: Sharon had not lost the capacity to astound.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sharon had not lost the capacity to astound.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sharon had not lost the capacity to astound.

auth_sentence.content: Not surprisingly, both will astound you!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not surprisingly, both will astound you!

auth_sentence.content: The variety and power of the human mind never fails to astound me.
auth_sentence.res_content: The variety and power of the human mind never fails to astound me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The variety and power of the human mind never fails to astound me.

means.word_mean: 使震惊, 使大吃一惊
